desc: Hiker Trash is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization that collects trash and turns it into high quality, long lasting bags, purses, wallets, and a number of other useful accessories. A key component of HikerTrash is environmental education.

layout.text: We are an awesome 501(c)(3) non-profit organization actively collecting and turning trash into a plethora of quality, handmade bags, purses, dog accessories, and hoards of great reinvented trash in between.
